HeadComp.title: Twilio vs MSG91 | WhatsApp Business API Comparison
HeadComp.description: Compare Twilio and MSG91 for WhatsApp Business API solutions. See how they differ in WhatsApp pricing, automation, template management, integrations, and support to choose the best WhatsApp platform for your business.

CompareBannerComp.heading: MSG91 vs Twilio
CompareBannerComp.subheading: MSG91 and Twilio are popular platforms for WhatsApp business communication. While Twilio focuses on API-driven integrations and global messaging, MSG91 offers a more user-friendly experience with features like template management, opt-out options, and tailored solutions, making it ideal for businesses looking to streamline WhatsApp interactions.

content.name: MSG91
content.des: MSG91 excels as a comprehensive WhatsApp messaging solution with built-in support for WhatsApp payments, carousel templates, AI-powered WhatsApp chatbots, and opt-out functionality. Additionally, MSG91 efficiently handles template conversion from utility to marketing, ensuring smooth messaging compliance. Its advanced automation and multi-channel capabilities make it a powerful choice for businesses aiming for scalable and cost-effective WhatsApp communication.

content.name: Twilio
content.des: Twilio is a cloud communication platform offering WhatsApp APIs for global messaging, focusing on automation and chatbot integration. However, it lacks specialized WhatsApp features like payments and carousel templates.

features.whatsapp_pricing: Costlier, Added margin on Meta pricing
features.whatsapp_template_creation: Twilio lets you create and manage WhatsApp templates in its console.
features.multi_agent_support: Twilio Flex offers per-agent or pay-as-you-go pricing based on usage.
features.other_channel_support: SMS, RCS, MMS, WhatsApp, and Facebook Messenger
features.whatsapp_ai_chatbot_integration: Twilio offers APIs to build AI chatbots using models like GPT with simple code.
features.unlimited_whatsapp_bot_creation: Twilio limits you to 5 chatbots—extra bots cost more.
features.whatsapp_payments: Twilio doesn’t support direct payments within WhatsApp chats.
features.whatsapp_carousels: supports creating and sending WhatsApp carousel templates.
features.integration_and_plugins_whatsapp: Integrates with Multiple platforms like Shopify, Zoho, Hubspot etc
features.otp_verification_whatsapp: Twilio Verify supports multichannel OTP and charges per verification.
features.unified_platform: With Twilio, full automation means using multiple services — twilio Segment,  twilio Engage,  twilio Flex, and more.
features.customer_support_quality: Limited free support; fast replies need a paid plan.
features.meta_ads_trackings_conversion: Twilio does not provide Meta ad analytics
